title: Person Record
description: The record contains information known about a natural person at a particular point in time, or from a given submission of information.
technical note: The recordDetails object should be validated using the Person Record schema.

title: Entity Record
description: The record contains information that identifies and describes an entity at a particular point in time, or from a given submission of information.
technical note: The recordDetails object should be validated using the Entity Record schema.

title: Relationship Record
description: The record contains details of the interests held by an interested party in an entity at a particular point in time.
technical note: The recordDetails object should be validated using the Relationship Record schema.
